article:
Dear Li Ming,
Thanks for your e-mail.Your life is very _ .And I hope I can visit you soon.Now I would like to tell you _ about my life in America.
The day starts at about 7 o'clock when Dad and Mum get up .My sister and I usually watch TV until _ at 8 o'clock.I like to eat rice and eggs.I also  _ a glass of milk.
After breakfast,I put on my school uniform _ take some food for lunch to school.At school one of my favourite subjects _ science.I also enjoy PE lessons-we play _ soccer,basketball and sometimes we do some running.
In the evening,I usually do _ homework before watching TV.Mum helps me with my homework.
I have many friends here.I would like to introduce them to you next time.Keep in touch!
Yours,
Jenny
